attributes.action: Request for HM The Queen to dissolve Parliament during summer 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time for Labour to seek a mandate to govern from the electorate. British Politics has lost credibility and some may argue so has the government. Let us not wait until Spring 2010 for a Gerneral Election. There is no better time than the present to rebuild public confidence and to do so with a General Election and new Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
